dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of telemedicine is long standing but only recently has been applied to the specialties of trauma emergency care and surgery Subsequently the concepts of teletrauma telepresence and telesurgery have evolved and are being integrated into modern care of trauma and surgical patients This chapter will review the current applications and future endeavors of telemedicine and telepresence to trauma and emergency care as the new frontiers of telemedicine application
Studies in health technology and informatics
Telepresence and telemedicine in trauma and emergency care management.
